game.name: Dwarven Village TD
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dwarven Village TD is a game that you place your units to enemy paths and towers to the sides to support, Also you need to build & upgrade on your village. Unlock new troops and towers through the journey.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dwarven Village TD is a game that you place your units to enemy paths and towers to the sides to support, Also you need to build & upgrade on your village. Unlock new troops and towers through the journey.
